[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Gas: materialization cost] Is read_and_materialize gas cost proportional to history size to prevent DoS? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Gas: storage access] Are resolver.get_aggregator_v1_value() calls properly metered for storage gas? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [DoS: validation complexity] Can attackers craft histories with maximum complexity to cause validation DoS? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Error: panic safety] The expect() and unreachable!() macros - can any be triggered by malicious input causing validator crashes? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Error: error propagation] Are all errors properly propagated as PartialVMError without information loss? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Error: recovery paths] If operations fail mid-execution, is aggregator state properly rolled back? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Error: error consistency] Do addition_v1_error and subtraction_v1_error provide consistent error reporting across validators? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [API: improper sequencing] Can calling methods in wrong order (e.g., read before any operations) cause unexpected behavior? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [API: double materialization] Can read_and_materialize be called multiple times, and what are security implications? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [API: max_value changes] Can max_value be changed between operations on same aggregator? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Type: StateKey usage] Is StateKey used consistently throughout, or can type confusion occur? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Auth: ID ownership] How is aggregator ID ownership verified - can attackers manipulate aggregators they don't own? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Auth: PeerId validation] In AggregatorID::new(), is PeerId properly validated to prevent impersonation? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Auth: TableHandle security] Can TableHandle be forged to access unauthorized storage locations? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Determinism: operation order] Are add/sub operations commutative, or can different execution orders produce different results? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Determinism: hash ordering] Does BTreeMap usage guarantee deterministic iteration order across validators? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/aggregator_v1_extension.rs] [Determinism: error handling] Are error conditions deterministic, or can validators diverge on error cases? (High)
